VOLUME/R I/Q

Emma/R Woodhouse/R ,/O handsome/G ,/O clever/G ,/O and/C rich/G ,/O with/P a/D comfortable/G home/N and/C happy/G disposition/N ,/O seemed/V to/P unite/V some/D of/P the/D best/G blessings/N of/P existence/N ;/O and/C had/V lived/V nearly/A twenty-one/O years/N in/P the/D world/N with/P very/A little/G to/P distress/N or/C vex/V her/Q ./O
She/Q was/V the/D youngest/G of/P the/D two/O daughters/N of/P a/D most/A affectionate/G ,/O indulgent/G father/N ;/O and/C had/V ,/O in/P consequence/N of/P her/Q sister/N 's/O marriage/N ,/O been/V mistress/N of/P his/Q house/N from/P a/D very/A early/G period/N ./O
Her/Q mother/N had/V died/V too/A long/G ago/A for/P her/Q to/P have/V more/G than/P an/D indistinct/G remembrance/N of/P her/Q caresses/N ;/O and/C her/Q place/N had/V been/V supplied/V by/P an/D excellent/G woman/N as/P governess/N ,/O who/Q had/V fallen/V little/G short/G of/P a/D mother/N in/P affection/N ./O
Sixteen/O years/N had/V Miss/R Taylor/R been/V in/P Mr./R Woodhouse/R 's/O family/N ,/O less/G as/P a/D governess/N than/P a/D friend/N ,/O very/A fond/N of/P both/D daughters/N ,/O but/C particularly/A of/P Emma/R ./O
Between/P _/N them/Q _/V it/Q was/V more/A the/D intimacy/N of/P sisters/N ./O
Even/A before/P Miss/R Taylor/R had/V ceased/V to/P hold/V the/D nominal/G office/N of/P governess/N ,/O the/D mildness/N of/P her/Q temper/N had/V hardly/A allowed/V her/Q to/P impose/V any/D restraint/N ;/O and/C the/D shadow/N of/P authority/N being/V now/A long/A passed/V away/A ,/O they/Q had/V been/V living/V together/A as/P friend/N and/C friend/N very/A mutually/A attached/V ,/O and/C Emma/R doing/V just/A what/Q she/Q liked/V ;/O highly/A esteeming/V Miss/R Taylor/R 's/O judgment/N ,/O but/C directed/V chiefly/A by/P her/Q own/G ./O
The/D real/G evils/N ,/O indeed/A ,/O of/P Emma/R 's/O situation/N were/V the/D power/N of/P having/V rather/A too/A much/A her/Q own/G way/N ,/O and/C a/D disposition/N to/P think/V a/D little/A too/A well/A of/P herself/Q ;/O these/D were/V the/D disadvantages/N which/O threatened/V alloy/N to/P her/Q many/G enjoyments/N ./O
